model_details.description: An implementation of a BERT based model (Shi et al, 2019) with some modifications (no additional parameters apart from a linear classification layer), which is currently the state of the art single model for English PropBank SRL (Newswire sentences). It achieves 86.49 test F1 on the Ontonotes 5.0 dataset.
model_details.short_description: A BERT based model (Shi et al, 2019) with some modifications (no additional parameters apart from a linear classification layer)
model_details.paper: [Simple BERT Models for Relation Extraction and Semantic Role Labeling](https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:131773936)

quantitative_analyses.unitary_results: 86.49 test F1 on the Ontonotes 5.0 dataset
